weka.clusterers

Class CentroidSketch

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.CentroidSketch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class CentroidSketch
extends java.lang.Object
implements TechnicalInformationHandler, java.io.Serializable
    Class for managing a sketch of centres for k-means, along with a weighted reservoir sample that is used over iterations to update the sketch. Used in the implementation of the k-means|| initialization method. For more information, see

    Bahman Bahmani, Benjamin Moseley, Andrea Vattani, Ravi Kumar, Sergei Vassilvitskii (2012). Scalable k-means++. Proceedings of the VLDB Endowment.:622-633.

    BibTeX: 

     @article{Bahmani2012,
    author = {Bahman Bahmani and Benjamin Moseley and Andrea Vattani and Ravi Kumar and Sergei Vassilvitskii},
    journal = {Proceedings of the VLDB Endowment},
    pages = {622-633},
    title = {Scalable k-means++},
    year = {2012}
 }

    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • CentroidSketch

        public CentroidSketch(Instances initialSketch,
              NormalizableDistance distanceFunction,
              int size,
              int seed)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        initialSketch - the initial starting point (typically one randomly chosen instance for the k-means|| algorithm)
        distanceFunction - the distance function to use
        size - the size of the reservoir (i.e. how many points to consider adding to the sketch at each iteration)
        seed - the seed for random number generation

    • Method Detail

      • globalInfo

        public java.lang.String globalInfo()
        Overview information for this class
        Returns:
        overview help information

      • process

        public void process(Instance toProcess,
           boolean updateDistanceFunction)
        Processes an instance - basically updates the reservoir
        Parameters:
        toProcess - the instance to process
        updateDistanceFunction - true if we should update the distance function with this instance (i.e. update the ranges for numeric attributes)

      • distanceToSketch

        public double distanceToSketch(Instance toProcess)
        Computes the distance between the supplied instance and the current sketch. This is the distance to the closest point in the sketch.
        Parameters:
        toProcess - the instance to process
        Returns:
        the distance to the current sketch

      • aggregateReservoir

        public void aggregateReservoir(WeightedReservoirSample toAggregate)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Aggregate the supplied reservoir into our reservoir. Does not increase the size of the sample.
        Parameters:
        toAggregate - the reservoir sample to aggregate
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the structure of the instances in the sample to aggregate does not match the structure of our sketch

      • resetReservoir

        public void resetReservoir()
        Clear the reservoir
